body:
DECLARE @tbl_SODetail UType_Table_SO_RDR1 

	DECLARE @tbl_Detail_Search TABLE
		(
			  DocEntry			INT
			, ItemCode			VARCHAR(20)
			, ItemName			NVARCHAR(254)
			, Serial			NVARCHAR(100)
			, Price				NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, FinalPrice		NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, Quantity			INT
			, DiscountInShop	NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, Warranty			VARCHAR(50)
			, Inventory			INT
			, InvntItem			CHAR(1)
			, TaxPrice			NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, Unit				NVARCHAR(20)
			, LocationCode		NVARCHAR(15)
			, TaxPercent		NVARCHAR(254)
			, TotalPrice		NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, Discount			NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, U_PROMOS			CHAR(1)
			, U_ProCode			NVARCHAR(100)
			, U_OnHand			INT
			, ManSerNum			CHAR(1)
			, TaxRate			NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, U_TGBH			INT
			, ReturnPrice		NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, U_FIFO			INT
			, U_WhsTo			NVARCHAR(100)
			, LineNum			INT
			, InvNum			NVARCHAR(254)
			, InvSymbol			NVARCHAR(254)
			, ConfirmBook		NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, IsVoucher			NVARCHAR(10)
			, IsNoPriceVoucher	NVARCHAR(10)
			, IsPrice			NVARCHAR(10)
			, U_Return			NVARCHAR(10)
			, PriceReturn		NUMERIC(19, 6)
			, U_DESC			NVARCHAR(254)
			, U_AccDim2			NVARCHAR(100)
			, U_AccDim3			NVARCHAR(100)
			, ItemType			INT
			, SoPhieu_BH		BIGINT
			, U_LineRet			NVARCHAR(254)
			, IDFormDK			INT
			, U_ReaCode			VARCHAR(254)
			, IsBookDoiTra		INT
			, isCheck			INT
			, VolUnit			SMALLINT
			, BaseQty			INT
			, BaseOpnQty		INT
			, PackQty			INT
			, U_BarCod			NVARCHAR(16)
			, U_VoucherNum		NVARCHAR(50)
			, FREE01			NVARCHAR(20)
		)

	INSERT INTO @tbl_Detail_Search
	EXEC sp_COMMOND_SearchSODetail @SOID

	INSERT INTO @tbl_SODetail
	    (
	         LineNum
	       , ItemCode
	       , ItemName
	       , Serial
	       , WhsCod
	       , Quantity
	       , Price
	       , TotalPrice
	       , TaxPrice
	       , TGBH
	       , DiscountInShop
	       , U_DisOther
	       , IsPromotion
	       , Unit
	       , TaxPercent
	       , InvntItem
	       , TaxRate
	       , HasSerial
	       , FIFO
	       , ToWarehouseCode
	       , ConfirmBook
	       , Inventory
	       , PromotionCode
	       , IsVoucher
	       , IsNoPriceVoucher
	       , Remark
	       , OrderedQty
	       , U_DESC
	       , U_AccDim2
	       , U_AccDim3
	       , ItemType
	       , SoPhieu_BH
	       , U_VoucherNum
	       , U_IsNoPriceVoucher
	       , U_IsVoucher
	       , U_LineRet
	       , IDFormDK
	       , U_ReaCode
	       , BaseQty
	       , BaseOpnQty
	       , PackQty
	       , VolUnit
	       , U_BarCod
	       , FREE01
	    )
	SELECT
		  T.LineNum
		, T.ItemCode
		, T.ItemName
		, T.Serial
		, T.LocationCode
		, T.Quantity
		, T.Price
		, T.TotalPrice
		, T.TaxPrice
		, T.U_TGBH
		, T.DiscountInShop
		, T.Discount
		, CASE T.U_PROMOS WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
		, T.Unit
		, T.TaxPercent
		, T.InvntItem
		, T.TaxRate
		, ''
		, CASE T.U_FIFO WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
		, T.U_WhsTo
		, T.ConfirmBook
		, T.Inventory
		, ''
		, T.IsVoucher
		, T.IsNoPriceVoucher
		, ''
		, T.ConfirmBook
		, ''
		, T.U_AccDim2
		, T.U_AccDim3
		, ''
		, T.SoPhieu_BH
		, T.U_VoucherNum
		, T.IsNoPriceVoucher
		, T.IsVoucher
		, T.U_LineRet
		, T.IDFormDK
		, T.U_ReaCode
		, T.BaseQty
		, T.BaseOpnQty
		, T.PackQty
		, T.VolUnit
		, T.U_BarCod
		, T.FREE01
	FROM
		@tbl_Detail_Search T
